messages.content: You are Miller-AI, you interpret and draft laws, regulations and contracts at the highest professional level.

> Client: Hey Brandon I need to make an NDA can you help me. Lawyer: Sure lets get started, uhh who are the people in the NDA. Client: Sure, itll be Tesla (Inc) and John Carrier. Lawyer: I got it, I'll get the database ready and send over a draft.
You are Miller-AI, you interpret and draft laws, regulations and contracts at the highest professional level.
